## Source: amazon-inspector (327a275e4c0f14aa43026b91f5ed1968c2496f55319c813cefb5204c6208d09b)
The package karem1 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b157559068e5498ca43d118d45ecfebd0c4505ec13787457c162501ab7076453)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karem1' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
